mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY dpdtjyy DESC) num, dpdtjyy, COUNT(*) AS dt, SUM(CASE jycs WHEN 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS jc1, SUM(CASE jycs WHEN 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS jc2, SUM(CASE jycs WHEN 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS jc3, SUM(CASE jycs WHEN 4 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS jc4, (select max('20' + SUBSTRING(jylsh, 8, 6)) as riqi from pda_db.dbo.AC_DATA_DYN) as riqi FROM pda_db.dbo.AC_DATA_DYN AS d WHERE (dpdtjyy IS NOT NULL) GROUP BY dpdtjyy

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY dpdtjyy DESC) num, dpdtjyy, COUNT(*) AS dt, SUM(CASE jycs WHEN 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS jc1, SUM(CASE jycs WHEN 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS jc2, SUM(CASE jycs WHEN 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS jc3, SUM(CASE jycs WHEN 4 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS jc4, (select max('20' + SUBSTRING(jylsh, 8, 6)) as riqi from pda_db.dbo.AC_DATA_DYN) as riqi FROM pda_db.dbo.AC_DATA_DYN AS d WHERE dpdtjyy like concat('%', #{dpdtjyy },'%') GROUP BY dpdtjyy
